tool_description:
This service provides detailed linguistic information for a given text in English, Spanish, French, Italian, Portuguese and Catalan. 

There are three operating modes that cover different aspects of the morphosyntactic and semantic analysis: Lemmatization, which provides the lemmas of the different words in a text; PoS tagging: which provides not only the grammatical category of a word, including semantic information about that word; Syntactic analysis: that provides a thorough syntactic analysis, giving a complete syntactic tree where the leaves represent the most basic elements and their morphological and semantic analyses.
title: Lemmatization POS and Parsing

api_list.name: parser-2.0
api_list.description: Lemmatization, PoS and Parsing is the name of MeaningCloud' API for the different basic linguistic modules.

required_parameters.name: lang
required_parameters.description: It specifies the language in which the text must be analyzed.

optional_parameters.name: txt
optional_parameters.description: Input text that's going to be analyzed
optional_parameters.default: Robert Downey Jr has topped Forbes magazine's annual list of the highest paid actors for the second year in a row.

optional_parameters.name: ud
optional_parameters.description: The user dictionary allows to include user-defined entities and concepts in the analysis.

optional_parameters.name: verbose
optional_parameters.description: Verbose mode. When active, it shows additional information about the morphosyntactic tagsets.

optional_parameters.name: txtf
optional_parameters.description: It specifies if the text included in the txt parameter uses markup language that needs to be interpreted.

optional_parameters.name: tt
optional_parameters.description: The list of topic types to extract will be specified through a string with the letters assigned to each one of the topic types that are to be extracted.

optional_parameters.name: st
optional_parameters.description: Show subtopics. This parameter will indicate if subtopics are to be shown.

optional_parameters.name: dm
optional_parameters.description: Type of disambiguation applied. It is accumulative, that is, the semantic disambiguation mode will also include morphosyntactic disambiguation.

optional_parameters.name: timeref
optional_parameters.description: This value allows to set a specific time reference to detect the actual value of all the relative time expressions detected in the text. It only applies when time expressions are enabled in tt. Format: YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss GMTÂ±HH:MM

optional_parameters.name: egp
optional_parameters.description: Expand global polarity. This mode allows you to choose between two different algorithms for the polarity detection of entities and concepts.

optional_parameters.name: sdg
optional_parameters.description: Semantic disambiguation grouping. This parameter will only apply when semantic disambiguation is activated (dm=s).

optional_parameters.name: sm
optional_parameters.description: Sentiment model chosen. If sent empty, sentiment analysis info will not be included in the response.
